result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Waiver of Right to Personal Appearance.
E-mail correspondence confirming defendant's appearance from Racine Correctional.
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 22, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
Scheduling conference on October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Attorney Amanda Skorr is appointed as counsel of record.  Defendant is to reimburse the county at a rate of $3.00 per month commencing 10-01-22.

2:56 PM Defendant Matthew E. Mayer appeared by video, in custody from Dodge Correctional.  Attorney Amanda Marie Skorr appeared by video for Matthew E. Mayer.  Attorney Angelina R Scarpelli appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Van Ells has discovered a conflict and withdrew as counsel.  Attorney Skorr has indicated that she will represent the Defendant in both matters.  No inducement made.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Defendant previously requested substitution in 22CF229, which resulted in Judge Dietz.  Substitution is not requested in the 22CF982.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea(s).  Jury Calendar.  Offer deadline is set for September 19, 2022.  
Minutes.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant in custody.

2:45 pm - Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Matthew E. Mayer not in court.  Attorney Ann Larson appearing in court for the defendant. Initial appearance on June 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:20 pm - Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Matthew E. Mayer appeared by video, in custody at Manitowoc County Jail.   Attorney Carl Knepel appearing in court with the defendant.  More time needed to appoint counsel in this matter.  Court sets bail at $10,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he comply with the Sex Offender Registry and that he provide an address and phone number, in writing, within 24 hours of release to the Clerk of Court office.  Bail furnished.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
